Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: improve domain intelligence with deduplication and detailed error messages

- Add per-user deduplication to prevent monitoring the same apex domain multiple times
- Prevent duplicate monitoring when checks like "subdomain.example.com" and "example.com" both extract to "example.com"
- Show detailed error messages in UI when bulk enable fails
- Display specific failure reasons for each check instead of generic "added 0 domains" message
- Improve user experience by closing modal only when at least some checks succeed

Fixes user-reported issue where enabling domain intelligence on additional checks would silently fail with "added 0 domains" and where having both a subdomain and apex domain as monitors would create duplicate tracking.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
